mapper.insert: insert into db_edisexpresstype (SID, NAMECN, NAMEEN, MAXWEIGHT, MAXTOTALLENGTH, MAXLENGTH, SUPPORTELEC, INCOTERMS, DIRECTIONS, DESCRIPTIONCN, DESCRIPTIONEN) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxtotallength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maxlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supportelec,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incoterms,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{directions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descriptioncn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descriptionen,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_edisexpresstype set NAMECN = #{namecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEEN = #{nameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXWEIGHT = #{maxweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXTOTALLENGTH = #{maxtotallength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXLENGTH = #{maxlength,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPORTELEC = #{supportelec,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCOTERMS = #{incoterms,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIRECTIONS = #{directions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTIONCN = #{descriptioncn,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCRIPTIONEN = #{descriptionen,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, NAMECN, NAMEEN, MAXWEIGHT, MAXTOTALLENGTH, MAXLENGTH, SUPPORTELEC, INCOTERMS, DIRECTIONS, DESCRIPTIONCN, DESCRIPTIONEN from db_edisexpresstype where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, NAMECN, NAMEEN, MAXWEIGHT, MAXTOTALLENGTH, MAXLENGTH, SUPPORTELEC, INCOTERMS, DIRECTIONS, DESCRIPTIONCN, DESCRIPTIONEN from db_edisexpresstype
